acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was acquired by Newman Library prior to 1962.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Michael Kinzer Family Papers was completed prior to 2010. Additional description was completed in January 2011.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: The Michael Kinzer family resided in Montgomery County, Virginia.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of documents concerned with the acquisition of land in Montgomery County, Michael Kinzer's last will and testament (1826), and a wallet. Within the land acquisition papers is included a deed (October 18, 1816) and a copy of a historical preservation report written by Dr. George Green Shackelford on the Michael Kinzer house. The wallet included in the collection was a Christmas present to W. A. Bell from W. B. Fiser in 1898.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Material in this collection are arranged in chronological order. Undated materials are at the beginning and bulk item are at the back.
